text:
I must be doing something wrong. I just decided to run the first example on <https://diffeq.sciml.ai/v2.0/tutorials/ode_example.html>
I added only DifferentialEquations and Plots
• DifferentialEquations v6.16.0
• Plots v1.10.4
When I run:
```using DifferentialEquations, Plots
f(t,u) = 1.01*u
u0=1/2
tspan = (0.0,1.0)
prob = ODEProblem(f,u0,tspan)
sol = solve(prob,Tsit5(),reltol=1e-8,abstol=1e-8)```
I get the error:
```ERROR: MethodError: no method matching f(::Float64, ::SciMLBase.NullParameters, ::Float64)```
